<a id="class_KinematicCollision3D"></a>

# KinematicCollision3D

**Inherits:** [RefCounted](class_refcounted.md) **<** [Object](class_object.md)

Holds collision data from the movement of a [PhysicsBody3D](class_physicsbody3d.md).

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

Holds collision data from the movement of a [PhysicsBody3D](class_physicsbody3d.md), usually from [PhysicsBody3D.move_and_collide()](class_physicsbody3d.md#class_PhysicsBody3D_method_move_and_collide). When a [PhysicsBody3D](class_physicsbody3d.md) is moved, it stops if it detects a collision with another body. If a collision is detected, a **KinematicCollision3D** object is returned.

The collision data includes the colliding object, the remaining motion, and the collision position. This data can be used to determine a custom response to the collision.

<!-- classref-reftable-group -->

<!-- classref-descriptions-group -->

## Method Descriptions

<a id="class_KinematicCollision3D_method_get_angle"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[float](class_float.md) **get_angle**\ (\ collision_index\: [int](class_int.md) = 0, up_direction\: [Vector3](class_vector3.md) = Vector3(0, 1, 0)\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_KinematicCollision3D_method_get_angle)

Returns the collision angle according to `up_direction`, which is [Vector3.UP](class_vector3.md#class_Vector3_constant_UP) by default. This value is always positive.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_KinematicCollision3D_method_get_collider"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[Object](class_object.md) **get_collider**\ (\ collision_index\: [int](class_int.md) = 0\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_KinematicCollision3D_method_get_collider)

Returns the colliding body's attached [Object](class_object.md) given a collision index (the deepest collision by default).

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_KinematicCollision3D_method_get_collider_id"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[int](class_int.md) **get_collider_id**\ (\ collision_index\: [int](class_int.md) = 0\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_KinematicCollision3D_method_get_collider_id)

Returns the unique instance ID of the colliding body's attached [Object](class_object.md) given a collision index (the deepest collision by default). See [Object.get_instance_id()](class_object.md#class_Object_method_get_instance_id).

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_KinematicCollision3D_method_get_collider_rid"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[RID](class_rid.md) **get_collider_rid**\ (\ collision_index\: [int](class_int.md) = 0\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_KinematicCollision3D_method_get_collider_rid)

Returns the colliding body's [RID](class_rid.md) used by the [PhysicsServer3D](class_physicsserver3d.md) given a collision index (the deepest collision by default).

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_KinematicCollision3D_method_get_collider_shape"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[Object](class_object.md) **get_collider_shape**\ (\ collision_index\: [int](class_int.md) = 0\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_KinematicCollision3D_method_get_collider_shape)

Returns the colliding body's shape given a collision index (the deepest collision by default).

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_KinematicCollision3D_method_get_collider_shape_index"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[int](class_int.md) **get_collider_shape_index**\ (\ collision_index\: [int](class_int.md) = 0\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_KinematicCollision3D_method_get_collider_shape_index)

Returns the colliding body's shape index given a collision index (the deepest collision by default). See [CollisionObject3D](class_collisionobject3d.md).

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_KinematicCollision3D_method_get_collider_velocity"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[Vector3](class_vector3.md) **get_collider_velocity**\ (\ collision_index\: [int](class_int.md) = 0\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_KinematicCollision3D_method_get_collider_velocity)

Returns the colliding body's velocity given a collision index (the deepest collision by default).

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_KinematicCollision3D_method_get_collision_count"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[int](class_int.md) **get_collision_count**\ (\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_KinematicCollision3D_method_get_collision_count)

Returns the number of detected collisions.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_KinematicCollision3D_method_get_depth"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[float](class_float.md) **get_depth**\ (\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_KinematicCollision3D_method_get_depth)

Returns the colliding body's length of overlap along the collision normal.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_KinematicCollision3D_method_get_local_shape"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[Object](class_object.md) **get_local_shape**\ (\ collision_index\: [int](class_int.md) = 0\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_KinematicCollision3D_method_get_local_shape)

Returns the moving object's colliding shape given a collision index (the deepest collision by default).

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_KinematicCollision3D_method_get_normal"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[Vector3](class_vector3.md) **get_normal**\ (\ collision_index\: [int](class_int.md) = 0\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_KinematicCollision3D_method_get_normal)

Returns the colliding body's shape's normal at the point of collision given a collision index (the deepest collision by default).

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_KinematicCollision3D_method_get_position"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[Vector3](class_vector3.md) **get_position**\ (\ collision_index\: [int](class_int.md) = 0\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_KinematicCollision3D_method_get_position)

Returns the point of collision in global coordinates given a collision index (the deepest collision by default).

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_KinematicCollision3D_method_get_remainder"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[Vector3](class_vector3.md) **get_remainder**\ (\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_KinematicCollision3D_method_get_remainder)

Returns the moving object's remaining movement vector.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_KinematicCollision3D_method_get_travel"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[Vector3](class_vector3.md) **get_travel**\ (\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_KinematicCollision3D_method_get_travel)
